Original question:
8. The rotor of a certain 25 hp, 6 pole, 60Hz induction motor has an equivalent
resistance and reactance per phase is 0.1 Ω and 0.5 Ω respectively. The blocked
rotor voltage/phase is 150 V. If the rotor is turning at 1164 rpm, determine:
a. synchronous speed
b. slip
c. rotor impedance
d. rotor current
e. rotor current is changing the shaft load resulted in 1.25% slip
f. speed for condition in e.
